mapper.select: SELECT id, maintenance_id, repair_date, mileage, content, material, type, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'aa_repairRecord_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = cmt.maintenance_type ) AS maintenance_type FROM common_maintenance_type cmt where maintenance_id = #{maintenanceType.maintenanceId} and maintenance_type = #{dictValue}
